TEXT.TITLE: NANOMETRICS INC <NANO> REDUCES WORKFORCE
TEXT.BODY: Nanometrics Inc said it is reducing its domestic workforce of 141 people by about 17 pct. The comapny said the action, coupled with other cost reduction measures, is intended to address the continuing slow sales of its semiconductor measurement and inspection equipment. Reuter
